text: Hi <@U0636P3PF5W> there  is  no option to ad the custom font in rich  text  field the only option is create the classes  in  css for the custom font and add those  classes  in rich text area

HI <@U077H4064AV> You can use local storage or cookies to store data. If a cookie is set, each request will check for it, preventing the end user from having to fill out the form again. This approach is also beneficial for performance.
